member.name: T:Cake.Transifex.ITransifexRunnerCommands
member.summary: Defines the commands supported by the transifex client and the transifex runner.

member.name: M:Cake.Transifex.ITransifexRunnerCommands.Init(Cake.Transifex.TransifexInitSettings)
member.summary: Initializes a transifex configuration file and the user configuration file (if token, username or password is specified).

remarks.note: Do not call this runner if a configuration file already exists in the repository. You will be asked to overwrite the file, which should not be done in cases where the file have already been configured.

member.name: M:Cake.Transifex.ITransifexRunnerCommands.Pull(Cake.Transifex.TransifexPullSettings)
member.summary: Pull files from remote server to local repository.
member.param: The settings to use when pulling resources from the server.

member.name: M:Cake.Transifex.ITransifexRunnerCommands.Push(Cake.Transifex.TransifexPushSettings)
member.summary: Push local files to remote server.
member.param: The settings to use when pushing resources to the server.

member.name: M:Cake.Transifex.ITransifexRunnerCommands.Status(System.String)
member.summary: Print status of current project.
member.param: The resources to check the status for (defaults to all).

member.name: T:Cake.Transifex.TransifexInitSettings
member.summary: Defines the properties that can be used when calling the init command on the transifex client. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: M:Cake.Transifex.TransifexInitSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Cake.Transifex.TransifexInitSettings.Host
member.summary: Gets or sets the default host of the transifex client.
member.remarks: Defaults to www.transifex.com to keep the user from being prompted to specify a host when called.

member.name: P:Cake.Transifex.TransifexInitSettings.Password
member.summary: Gets or sets the password for the user when connecting to transifex.
member.remarks: Can not be used together with the parameter.

members.member:
Gets or sets the token to use when connecting to transifex. >
Can not be used at the same time as setting the or parameter.

member.name: P:Cake.Transifex.TransifexInitSettings.Username
member.summary: Gets or sets the username for the user when connecting to transifex.
member.remarks: Can not be used at the same time as setting the parameter.

member.name: M:Cake.Transifex.TransifexInitSettings.EvaluateCore(Cake.Core.IO.ProcessArgumentBuilder)
member.exception: Thrown when both the property and either the or properties have been specified.

member.name: T:Cake.Transifex.TransifexMode
member.summary: Specifies the mode of the translation file to pull

member.name: F:Cake.Transifex.TransifexMode.Reviewed
member.summary: Only pull down reviewed translations.
member.remarks: All translations that have not been reviewed will either be empty, or be in the source language (depending on the file format used)

member.name: F:Cake.Transifex.TransifexMode.Developer
member.summary: Pull down all translations, whether they have been translated or not.
member.remarks: These are files suitable for usage by developers in their source code tree.

member.name: F:Cake.Transifex.TransifexMode.Translator
member.summary: Pull down all completed translations, whether they have been reviewed or not.
member.remarks: These are files suitable for offline translation of the resource(s).

member.name: F:Cake.Transifex.TransifexMode.OnlyTranslated
member.summary: Pull down only strings that have been translated.

member.name: F:Cake.Transifex.TransifexMode.OnlyReviewed
member.summary: Pull down only strings that have been translated and reviewed.

member.name: F:Cake.Transifex.TransifexMode.SourceAsTranslation
member.summary: Pull down both translated and untranslated strings (untranslated strings will be set to the value of the source).

member.name: T:Cake.Transifex.TransifexPullSettings

member.summary: The wrapper around the transifex client. This class cannot be inherited.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Cake.Transifex.TransifexRunnerAliases
member.summary: Provides a wrapper around transifex client functionality within a Cake build script.

member.name: M:Cake.Transifex.TransifexRunnerAliases.TransifexInit(Cake.Core.ICakeContext)
member.summary: This command initializes the current repository with a default configuration file, and sets the host to www.transifex.com.
member.para: Runs tx init --host www.transifex.com with the specified with default settings.

member.name: M:Cake.Transifex.TransifexRunnerAliases.TransifexInit(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Transifex.TransifexInitSettings)
member.summary: This command initializes the current repository with a default configuration file, and optionally the user configuration file with either a Username + Password combination or an API token.
member.param: The settings to use when initializing repository.
member.para: Runs tx init with the specified

code.title: Initialize with a username and password

member.exception: Thrown when both the property and either the or properties have been specified in the parameter.

member.name: M:Cake.Transifex.TransifexRunnerAliases.TransifexPull(Cake.Core.ICakeContext)
member.summary: This command pulls all outstanding changes from the remote Transifex server to the local repository. By default only the files that are watched by transifex will be updated.

member.name: M:Cake.Transifex.TransifexRunnerAliases.TransifexPull(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Transifex.TransifexPullSettings)
member.summary: This command pulls all outstanding changes from the remote Transifex server to the local repository. By default, only the files that are watched by Transifex will be updated but if you want to fetch the translations for new languages as well, set the property to true in the .

member.name: M:Cake.Transifex.TransifexRunnerAliases.TransifexPush(Cake.Core.ICakeContext)
member.summary: This command pushes all local files that have been added to Transifex to the remote server. All new translations are merged with existing ones and if a language doesn't exist then it is created.

member.name: M:Cake.Transifex.TransifexRunnerAliases.TransifexPush(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Transifex.TransifexPushSettings)
member.summary: This command pushes all local files that have been added to Transifex to the remote server. All new translations are merged with existing ones and if a language doesn't exist then it gets created. If you want to push the source file as well (either because this is your first time running the client or because you have updated with new entries), set the to true. By default, this command will push all files which are watched by Transifex but you can filter this per resource or/and language.

member.name: M:Cake.Transifex.TransifexRunnerAliases.TransifexStatus(Cake.Core.ICakeContext)
member.summary: Prints the status of the current project by reading the data in the configuration file.

member.name: M:Cake.Transifex.TransifexRunnerAliases.TransifexStatus(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.String)
member.summary: Prints the status of the current project by reading the data in the configuration file, but only for the specified .
